game.s_dis: DK: King of Swing is a 2005 GBA puzzle-platformer where Donkey Kong swings on pegs to retrieve stolen tournament medals, featuring a unique control scheme and multiplayer support.
game.l_dis:
Play DK: King of Swing GBA Online – Puzzle-Platform Adventure

DK: King of Swing challenges players to help Donkey Kong retrieve stolen tournament medals from King K. Rool. Swing on pegs, rotate around them, and build momentum using a unique control system to navigate levels and overcome obstacles.

What is DK: King of Swing?

DK: King of Swing is a 2005 puzzle-platformer for the Game Boy Advance. The gameplay revolves around rotating and swinging on pegs using shoulder buttons, a distinct control scheme for the Donkey Kong series. The game includes an adventure mode and a multiplayer mode supporting up to four players.

How to Play DK: King of Swing

  • Swing on Pegs: Use DK's hands to grab pegs and rotate around them.
  • Build Momentum: Swing strategically to reach higher platforms and navigate levels.
  • Adventure Mode: Progress through stages to recover stolen tournament medals.
  • Multiplayer Mode: Play with up to four players for competitive swinging challenges.
  • Unique Controls: Use shoulder buttons to control swings, making precise movement key to success.

Why Play DK: King of Swing Online?

Play DK: King of Swing unblocked online for free. Experience a unique puzzle-platformer with inventive controls, challenging levels, and multiplayer action directly in your browser without downloads or emulators.

Key Features

  • Puzzle-Platform Gameplay: Swing, rotate, and build momentum to solve challenges.
  • Unique Control Scheme: Shoulder buttons control DK's swings for precise movement.
  • Adventure & Multiplayer: Story-driven adventure mode and up to four-player multiplayer.
  • Challenging Levels: Navigate increasingly difficult stages to recover medals.
  • Donkey Kong Experience: Innovative gameplay within the classic DK universe.

Help Donkey Kong Recover the Medals!

Join Donkey Kong in DK: King of Swing, swing through challenging levels, and compete with friends in multiplayer. Play unblocked online and enjoy this creative GBA puzzle-platformer!
